seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML Foundations - Intro and Document Structure | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Learn the foundations of HTML including document structure, DOCTYPE declarations, and the basic building blocks of every web page.
seo_metadata.og_title: HTML Foundations - Intro and Document Structure
seo_metadata.og_description: Master the foundations of HTML including document structure, DOCTYPE declarations, and the basic building blocks of every web page.
seo_metadata.twitter_title: HTML Foundations - Intro and Document Structure
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Learn HTML document structure, DOCTYPE declarations, and the basic building blocks of every web page.

seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML Elements, Tags and DOM Fundamentals | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Understand HTML elements, opening and closing tags, attributes, and how the Document Object Model (DOM) structures web content.
seo_metadata.og_title: HTML Elements, Tags and DOM Fundamentals
seo_metadata.og_description: Understand HTML elements, tags, attributes, and the Document Object Model (DOM) in this essential module.
seo_metadata.og_image_alt: HTML Elements, Tags and DOM Fundamentals
seo_metadata.twitter_title: HTML Elements, Tags and DOM Fundamentals
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Learn HTML elements, tags, attributes, and the DOM structure of web pages.

seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML Headings, Paragraphs and Text Content | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Learn how to use HTML headings (h1–h6), paragraphs, inline text elements, and other text content tags to structure readable web pages.
seo_metadata.og_title: HTML Headings, Paragraphs and Text Content
seo_metadata.og_description: Learn how to use HTML headings, paragraphs, and inline text elements to structure clear, readable web pages.
seo_metadata.og_image_alt: HTML Headings, Paragraphs and Text Content
seo_metadata.twitter_title: HTML Headings, Paragraphs and Text Content
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Master HTML text elements — headings, paragraphs, bold, italic, and more.

seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML Linking and Semantic Page Layout | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Learn to create hyperlinks with anchor tags and build semantic page layouts using header, nav, main, section, article, aside, and footer elements.
seo_metadata.og_title: HTML Linking and Semantic Page Layout
seo_metadata.og_description: Create hyperlinks and build semantic page layouts using HTML5 structural elements like header, nav, main, and footer.
seo_metadata.og_image_alt: HTML Linking and Semantic Page Layout
seo_metadata.twitter_title: HTML Linking and Semantic Page Layout
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Learn HTML anchor tags, hyperlinks, and semantic page layout elements.

seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML Lists - Ordered, Unordered and Description Lists | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Learn how to create ordered lists (ol), unordered lists (ul), and description lists (dl) in HTML, including nested and styled variations.
seo_metadata.og_title: HTML Lists - Ordered, Unordered and Description Lists
seo_metadata.og_description: Master ordered lists, unordered lists, and description lists in HTML with practical examples.
seo_metadata.og_image_alt: HTML Lists - Ordered, Unordered and Description Lists
seo_metadata.twitter_title: HTML Lists - Ordered, Unordered and Description Lists
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Learn to create and style ordered, unordered, and description lists in HTML.

seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML Tables - Structure, Headers and Accessibility | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Learn how to create HTML tables using table, thead, tbody, tr, th, and td elements, including spanning columns and rows, and accessible table markup.
seo_metadata.og_title: HTML Tables - Structure, Headers and Accessibility
seo_metadata.og_description: Build structured, accessible HTML tables using table, thead, tbody, tr, th, and td elements with colspan and rowspan.
seo_metadata.twitter_title: HTML Tables - Structure, Headers and Accessibility
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Learn to build structured and accessible HTML tables with headers, body, and spanning cells.

seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML Media and Embeds - Images, Audio, Video and Iframes | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Learn how to embed images, audio, video, and external content using HTML img, audio, video, and iframe elements with best practices.
seo_metadata.og_title: HTML Media and Embeds - Images, Audio, Video and Iframes
seo_metadata.og_description: Learn to embed images, audio, video, and external content in HTML pages using semantic media elements.
seo_metadata.twitter_title: HTML Media and Embeds - Images, Audio, Video and Iframes
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Learn how to embed images, audio, video, and iframes in your HTML pages.

seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML Forms and User Input - Inputs, Labels and Validation | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Learn to build HTML forms using form, input, textarea, select, button, and label elements, including form validation and accessibility best practices.
seo_metadata.og_description: Build accessible and validated HTML forms with inputs, labels, selects, textareas, and buttons.
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Learn to create HTML forms with inputs, validation, labels, and accessibility best practices.

seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML CSS, Scripts and Loading Strategy | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Learn how to link CSS stylesheets and JavaScript files in HTML, and understand loading strategies like async, defer, and critical rendering path.
seo_metadata.og_title: HTML CSS, Scripts and Loading Strategy
seo_metadata.og_description: Learn how to link CSS and JavaScript in HTML and optimize loading with async, defer, and rendering strategies.
seo_metadata.og_image_alt: HTML CSS Scripts and Loading Strategy
seo_metadata.twitter_title: HTML CSS, Scripts and Loading Strategy
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Link CSS and JS in HTML and optimize page loading with async, defer, and critical path strategies.

seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML Accessibility and SEO Best Practices | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Learn HTML accessibility techniques including ARIA roles, alt text, landmark elements, and SEO best practices for building inclusive and discoverable web pages.
seo_metadata.og_title: HTML Accessibility and SEO Best Practices
seo_metadata.og_description: Build inclusive and SEO-friendly HTML pages using ARIA roles, alt text, landmarks, and semantic markup.
seo_metadata.twitter_title: HTML Accessibility and SEO Best Practices
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Make your HTML pages accessible and SEO-friendly with ARIA, alt text, and semantic elements.

seo_metadata.meta_title: Advanced Browser APIs in HTML Context | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Explore advanced browser APIs used alongside HTML, including Geolocation, Web Storage, Canvas, Drag and Drop, and Web Workers.
seo_metadata.og_title: Advanced Browser APIs in HTML Context
seo_metadata.og_description: Explore advanced HTML5 browser APIs including Geolocation, Web Storage, Canvas, and Web Workers.
seo_metadata.og_image_alt: Advanced Browser APIs in HTML Context
seo_metadata.twitter_title: Advanced Browser APIs in HTML Context
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Dive into advanced HTML5 APIs: Geolocation, Canvas, Web Storage, Drag and Drop, and more.

seo_metadata.meta_title: HTML Encoding, Validation and Standards | Learn HTML
seo_metadata.meta_description: Learn about character encoding, HTML validation tools, W3C standards compliance, and best practices for writing clean, valid HTML documents.
seo_metadata.og_description: Learn character encoding, HTML validation, and W3C standards to write clean, compliant HTML.
seo_metadata.twitter_description: Understand HTML character encoding, validation tools, and W3C standards for clean HTML.
